name: SJF Ventures
description: SJF Ventures is an expansion-stage venture capital firm that focuses on the clean energy and efficiency, asset recovery and recycling, food and sustainable agriculture, education, health and wellness, and consumer and enterprise software sectors. The firm has offices in Durham, North Carolina; San Francisco and New York.

name: Samsung NEXT Ventures
description: Samsung Global Innovation Center is a venture capital firm which invests in entrepreneurs and startups to create software and services. The team of entrepreneurs, engineers, investors, strategists, business developers and experts work together to empower the global community of startups. the firm is based in Silicon Valley, California with additional offices in New York, New York; Tel Aviv, Israel and Japan, Seoul.

name: 500 Startups
description: 500 Startups is a seed fund and startup accelerator that offers accelerator programs for start-up companies operating in the financial services, consumer products, healthcare, e-commerce, business productivity, education, infrastructure services and internet sectors. The firm was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Mountain View, California.

name: Accel Partners
description: Accel Partners is a Palo Alto, California based venture capital investment firm. The firm focuses on investing in companies within the internet infrastructure, internet software, consumer services, mobile, software, information technology, cyber security and cloud-enabled service sectors.

name: Benchmark Capital
description: Benchmark Capital is an early stage venture capital firm which focuses on investing in enterprise software, communication, security, semiconductor, mobile, social, cloud computing, consumer service, financial service, internet retail, online service, infrastructure service, system software and optical device sectors. The firm was established in 1995 and is headquartered in San Francisco, California.

name: Bloomberg Beta
description: Bloomberg Beta is a corporate venture capital arm of Bloomberg. The firm's goal is to expand Bloomberg's horizons by backing extraordinary entrepreneurs or creating companies, who have something to teach the world. I t was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in San Francisco, California with an additional office in New York, New York.

name: Canaan Partners
description: Canaan Partners is a global venture capital firm based in Menlo Park, California. The firm focuses on investing in companies within the digital media, communications, mobility, enterprise, bio-pharmaceuticals, medical devices, digital health, medtech, diagnostics and infrastructure sectors. It was founded in 1987.

name: Frontier venture Capital
description: Frontier Venture Capital is a venture capital firm headquartered in Santa Monica, California and was founded in 2002. The firm seeks to invest in the media and technology sectors and has additional offices in Portland, Santa Barbara, Sacramento and New York. It specializes in early stage investments.

name: First Round Capital
description: First Round Capital is a venture capital firm which specializes in seed and early-stage investments. The firm prefers to invest in companies based in the United States, operating in the technology-based, distribution, marketing focused and advertising sectors. First Round was founded in 2004 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: GV
description: GV is the corporate venture capital arm of Google and a subsidiary of Alphabet Inc. The firm provides seed, early stage and growth stage investments particularly in the mobile, software, consumer internet, life sciences, gaming, big data, financial technology and media sectors. It was established in 2009 and is headquartered in Mountain View, California.

name: Lightstone ventures
description: Lightstone Ventures is a venture capital firm which focuses on investing in early stage healthcare, life sciences, medical devices, therapeutics and novel bio-pharmaceutical companies. The firm specializes in early stage and selective later stage investments. The firm was founded in 2012 and is based out of Menlo Park, California.

name: New Enterprise Associates
description: New Enterprise Associates is a venture capital firm that specializes in seed, early stage, later stage, PIPE, expansion, and mezzanine investments. The firm seeks to invest in the communications, software, electronics, healthcare, energy and information technology sectors. The firm was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Menlo Park, California with additional offices in Asia, Europe and the United States.

name: NewSchools Venture Fund
description: NewSchools Venture Fund is a non-profit venture philanthropy fund that invests in nonprofit and for-profit educational organizations and educational entrepreneurship projects at the K-12 levels in United States public schools. It is headquartered in Oakland, California and was established in 1998.

name: Susa Ventures
description: Susa Ventures is a venture capital firm prefers to invest in early stage companies which build data platforms, analytics and tools. The firm focuses primarily on data-rich sectors such as health, finance, commerce and education.

name: TWilio Fund
description: Twilio Fund is a $50 million investment fund designed to grow an ecosystem of companies that build innovative and engaging applications on Twilio's platform. It partnered with venture capital firms Bessemer Venture Partners, Draper Fisher Jurvetson, and Redpoint Ventures to fund developers and startups using Twilio's platform to build mobile and web applications.

name: Techstars
description: Techstars is a mentorship-driven seed stage investment program. The firm runs a three-month-long acceleration program in multiple cities in the United States and the United Kingdom annually. The companies the firm selects for its programs each receive 100k -200k in seed funding, along with opportunities for mentoring and a chance to pitch a startup idea to angel investors and venture capital firms. It provides access to community leaders, founders, mentors, investors, and corporate partners, allowing entrepreneurs to accelerate and provide education, experience and funding.

name: Chartline Capital Partners
description: Chartline Capital Partners is a minority equity investor committed to helping boards, investors, and management teams realize the full potential value of venture-backed companies. The firm invests in digital health, digital industrials, retail analytics, communications infrastructure and food supply chain sectors. The firm does not invest in the real estate, B2C, social, fintech, material science and therapeutic sectors. The firm is a spin-out of yet2Ventures, the corporate venture capital arm of yet2.

name: GSV Ventures
description: Gentry Venture Partners is the corporate venture capital arm of Gentry Financial Corporation and is based in Chicago, Illinois. The firm focuses on investing in companies operating in the biotechnology, clean-tech, energy and information technology sectors.

name: Liberty Mutual Strategic Ventures
description: Liberty Mutual Strategic Ventures is the venture capital arm of Liberty Mutual Insurance Company which specializes in seed, early stage and later stage venture investments. It is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: .406 ventures
description: .406 Ventures is an early-stage venture capital firm based in Boston, Massachusetts. The firm focuses on investing in companies based in the Eastern United States, and operating within the big data, digital media infrastructure, financial technology, information security, open source, web infrastructure, cloud technology, healthcare information technology, energy information technology, next generation software and technology services sectors.

name: Ascent venture Partners
description: Ascent Venture Partners is a Boston, Massachusetts based venture capital firm that focuses on investing in companies operating in the software, cloud business services, data analytic, mobile, financial services, healthcare, media, retail and manufacturing sectors.

name: Bain Capital Ventures
description: Bain Capital Ventures (BCV) provides seed through growth capital for companies focused on technology and technology-enabled services primarily for enterprise customers. BCV invests across sectors including infrastructure software, application software, FinTech and healthcare. As the venture capital affiliate of Bain Capital, a assets firm, BCV has partnered with more than 200 companies since 1984 to start, build, commercialize and grow their businesses. The firm has offices in the Bay Area, New York City and Boston.

name: Battery ventures
description: Battery Ventures is a venture capital and private equity technology-focused investment firm that invest in the software and services, web infrastructure, consumer internet, mobile and industrial technologies sectors. The firm was founded in 1983 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Bolt Innovation Group
description: Bolt Innovation Group is a venture capital firm which seeks to invest in companies operating in the software, hardware and information technology sectors. The firm is based in Boston, Massachusetts and was founded in 2013.

name: Converge Venture Partners
description: Converge Venture Partners is a venture capital firm specializing in seed and early stage investments. The firm seeks to invest in early stage software and technology startups in the Northeast.

name: Cue Ball
description: Cue Ball is a venture capital and early growth equity firm that focuses on investing in the enterprise internet, digital media, e-commerce, consumer products, media and retail sectors. The firm was founded in 2008 and based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Elephant Partners
description: Elephant Partners is a venture capital firm focused on consumer internet, mobile and software. The firm is based in New York, New York and was founded in 2015.

name: Excel Venture Management
description: Excel Venture Management is a venture capital firm based in Boston, Massachusetts. The firm prefers to invest in the life sciences, diagnostic equipment, medical devices, healthcare services, agriculture, energy, materials, defense and information technology sectors.

name: Fairhaven Capital Partners
description: Fairhaven Capital Partners is a venture capital firm that prefers to invest in the consumer, information technology, manufacturing and mobile sectors. The firm was founded in 2007 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Flare Capital Partners
description: Flare Capital Partners is a venture capital firm that specializes in early stage and growth investments. The firm is based in Boston, Massachusetts and seeks to invest in the healthcare and technology sectors. It was founded in 2013.

name: Founder Collective
description: Founder Collective is a seed stage venture capital fund which seeks to invest in the advertising technology, business product, business service, consumer service, consumer product, e-commerce, embedded device, healthcare, mobile, marketplace, information technology and software sectors. The firm was founded in 2009 and has offices in Cambridge, Massachusetts and New York, New York.

name: G20 Ventures
description: G20 Ventures is a venture capital firm that prefers to invest in early stage companies with a focus on enterprise software, infrastructure and internet solutions. The firm does not invest in businesses that are fully customer based and prefers to invest in teams of at least two people. It is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: General Catalyst Partners
description: General Catalyst Partners is a Cambridge, Massachusetts based venture capital and private equity firm. The firm focuses on investing in companies within the information technology, healthcare, energy, media, retail, mobile and manufacturing sectors.

name: HLM Venture Partners
description: HLM Venture Partners is a venture capital firm based in Boston, Massachusetts. The firm invests in the healthcare information technology, healthcare services and medical device sectors.

name: Long River Ventures
description: Long River Ventures is a venture capital firm that invests in seed and early stage companies in the healthcare, information technology and other technology-driven sectors. The firm was founded in 2000 and has offices in Amherst and Boston, Massachusetts, investing in the Northeast.

name: Longwood Fund
description: Longwood Fund is a venture capital firm that seeks to invest in the healthcare, pharmaceuticals and biotechnology sectors. The firm is based in Boston, Massachusetts and was founded in 2010.

name: NextView Ventures
description: NextView Ventures is a venture capital firm based in Boston, Massachusetts. The firm specializes in seed stage investments in the internet enabled businesses, commerce, marketplaces, consumer services, SaaS, marketing and ad tech and information technology sectors.

name: Omega Funds
description: Omega Funds is a venture capital firm based in Boston, Massachusetts. The firm was founded in 2004 and prefers to invest in companies operating in the biotechnology, medical technology, diagnostics, services and healthcare information technology sectors.

name: OpenView venture Partners
description: OpenView Venture Partners is a Boston, Massachusetts based venture capital firm. The firm invests in the mobile SaaS business, internet, education technology and security, cloud computing, enterprise technologies, data management and infrastructure software sectors.

name: Partners Healthcare
description: Partners HealthCare is an integrated health care system, founded by Brigham and Women's Hospital and Massachusetts General Hospital that offers patient care, research and teaching services to the community. The firm seeks to invest through its investment arm Partners Innovation Fund in the biotechnology, medical technology, diagnostic technology, drugs, vaccines and medical software sectors. It was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Polaris Partners
description: Polaris Venture Partners is a private equity and venture capital firm that invests in seed and early stage, late stage and in high-growth middle market companies. The firm primarily invests in the technology, healthcare and consumer sectors.

name: Procyon ventures
description: Procyon Ventures is a venture capital firm that prefers to invest in early stage start up companies based in North America and Asia and solving real-world problems using data and machine intelligence, focusing on applications of frontier technologies such as artificial intelligenceI, computational biotech, connected sensors, augmented reality and virtual reality, and industrial internet of things.

name: Progress ventures
description: Progress Ventures is a venture capital firm that invests in early stage companies. The firm seeks to invest in the digital media, internet of thing, adtech, e-commerce, technology enabled service and big data sectors. It is headquartered in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Sigma Prime Ventures
description: Sigma Prime Ventures is an early stage venture capital firm that invest in the technology companies focusing on SaaS, cloud, mobile, disruptive technologies and technology-enabled service companies. The firm was founded in 2012 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Spark Capital
description: Spark Capital is a venture capital firm that invests in startups led by creative thinkers. Spark has offices in the Back Bay in Boston, Astor Place in New York City and SoMA in San Francisco. Spark Capital was founded in 2005, and today manages five funds with $2 billion under management.

name: Third Rock Ventures
description: Third Rock Ventures is a venture capital firm that invests in companies operating in the healthcare, medicine, life sciences, drugs, devices and diagnostics, therapeutics and information technology sectors. It was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts with an additional office in San Francisco, California.

name: Under score.VC
description: Underscore.VC is a venture capital firm that prefers to invest in the technology, SaaS, cloud, open source and mobile sectors. The firm was founded in 2015 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Fontinalis Partners
description: Fontinalis Partners is a venture capital firm that seeks to invest in companies operating in the technology, mobile and transportation sectors. The firm is headquartered in Detroit, Michigan with an additional office in Boston, Massachusetts and was founded in 2009.

name: sosv
description: SOSV is an accelerator and a global venture capital firm that focuses on investing around four key verticals: hardware, biotechnology & biodesign, food, and China/Asia internet and e-commerce. The firm operates four accelerator programs that provide funding, mentoring and training in these areas: HAX, Chinaccelerator, Food-X Accelerator and IndieBio. HAX is an accelerator that specializes in the hardware, manufacturing, startups, product development, positioning, marketing and prototyping sectors. Chinaccelerator is the longest running accelerator in China (2010), based in Shanghai, and investing in companies focused on internet and e-commerce platforms for the China/Asia market. FOOD-X is focused on launching food-related ventures, located in New York. IndieBio focuses on entrepreneurs building technologies in or around the fields of biotechnology, biodesign and synthetic biology, offering seed funding and lab space as well as mentorship to start-ups, located in San Francisco and Cork, Ireland.

name: AXA Strategic ventures
description: AXA Strategic Ventures is a venture capital fund that prefers to invest in the insurance, asset management, financial technology, peer-to-peer insurance, micro-insurance, data analytics and healthcare service sectors.

name: Lowercase Capital
description: Lowercase Capital is a private equity and venture capital firm that invests in startups, acquires later stage companies and advises businesses and funds of all sizes on strategy and execution. The firm was established in 2007 and is based in Hermosa Beach, California.

name: Accel Foods
description: AccelFoods is an accelerator firm that seeks to invest in innovative, cutting-edge, high growth, early-stage brands in the packaged food and beverage space sectors. The firm was founded in 2013 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Boldstart Ventures
description: BOLDstart Ventures is a venture capital firm based in New York, New York. The firm focuses on investing in companies operating in the enterprise, SaaS, smart data, information technology and mobile technology sectors.

name: Bowery Capital
description: Bowery Capital is an early-stage venture capital fund investing in business software. The firm focuses on helping its founders build the next generation of B2B market leaders. It is based in New York, New York and was founded in 2013.

name: Bessemer venture Partners
description: Founded in 1911, Bessemer Venture Partners is a venture capital firm based in Larchmont, New York. The firm focuses on investing in companies operating in the clean technology, energy, healthcare, financial services, mobile, data security, cloud computing, software, communications and manufacturing sectors.

name: CAVU Venture Partners
description: CAVU Venture Partners is a New York, New York based venture capital firm. The firm focuses on investments in consumer product companies with a concentration in the food, beverage, pet, personal care, beauty, apparel, retail and household product sectors.

name: Centana Growth Partners
description: Centana Growth Partners is a venture capital firm which provides capital to accelerate or sustain rapid growth for companies in financial services, financial technology and enterprise technology. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York with an additional office in Menlo Park, California.

name: Collaborative Fund
description: Collaborative Fund is a venture capital fund focused on supporting and investing in the shared future. The firm seeks to invest in the consumer, health and kids sectors.

name: Compound Ventures
description: Compound Ventures is a New York, New York based venture capital firm that invests in start-up and early stage technology companies. The firm seeks to invest in companies operating in the information technology, e-commerce, financial technology, mobile, big data, media, retail and technology sectors.

name: Contour Venture Partners
description: Contour Venture Partners is a New York, New York based early stage venture capital firm. The firm seeks to invest in the financial services, internet, digital media, business services and software sectors.

name: Deerfield Management
description: Deerfield Management is a venture capital firm based in New York with additional offices in Shanghai, China and Epalinges, Switzerland. The firm seeks to invest in the healthcare, pharmaceutical and biotechnology sectors.

name: Eniac Ventures
description: Eniac Ventures is a seed stage venture firm investing in the mobile technology sector. The firm's specifically targeted sectors within mobile include big data, cloud computing, social, gaming, ad-tech and enterprise. It is based in New York, New York and was founded in the year 2009.

name: ff venture Capital
description: ff Venture Capital is an early-stage VC firm in New York. The firm backs creative entrepreneurs who are using technology to transform industries such as food, disaster recovery housing, crowdfunding and drones. The firm's portfolio companies have ongoing access to the ff Acceleration Team, who provide a full range of services in accounting and finance, PR and branding, engineering, recruiting, community management and business development.

name: FirstMark Capital
description: FirstMark Capital is an early stage venture capital firm investing in technology and technology-enabled companies. The firm primarily makes Seed and Series A investments, but also invests in later stage companies and makes follow-on investments through their opportunity fund series. It was founded in 2008 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Great Oaks venture Capital
description: Great Oaks Venture Capital is a venture capital firm which specializes in seed, early stage and later stage investments. The firm prefers to invest in companies based in New York and San Francisco operating in the gaming, consumer mobile, technology, internet, Saas and hardware sectors. It was founded in 2003 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Greycroft Partners
description: Greycroft Partners is a venture capital firm focused on investments in the Internet and mobile markets. With offices in the two media capitals of the world, New York and Los Angeles, Greycroft is positioned to serve entrepreneurs who have chosen to be partners. Greycroft leverages a network of media and technology industry connections to help entrepreneurs gain visibility, build strategic relationships, successfully bring their products to market, and build successful businesses.

name: Harmony Partners
description: Harmony Partners is a boutique venture capital firm that focuses on investing in the technology, medical and consumer based companies. The firm was founded in 2008 and is based in New York, New York with additional offices in Menlo Park and San Francisco.

name: IA Ventures
description: IA Ventures is an early stage venture firm focused on creating competitive advantage through data. The firm focuses on investing in companies operating in the information technology, e-commerce, software, financial services, healthcare, media, big data and business services sectors. The firm was founded in 2010.

name: Lead Edge Capital
description: Lead Edge Capital is a venture capital firm that seeks to invest in expansion stage technology companies. The firm prefers to invest in the software, internet services, e-commerce and digital media sectors. It was founded in 2009 and is based in New York.

name: Lerer Hippeau ventures
description: Lerer Hippeau Ventures is a seed stage venture capital firm which seeks to invest in companies operating in the information technology, media, retail, mobile and manufacturing sectors. LHV was founded in 2010 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Lux Capital
description: Lux Capital is a venture capital firm based in New York, New York. The firm was established in 2000 and invests in emerging technologies in the physical and life science sectors.

name: Marker
description: Marker is a venture capital firm which specializes in seed, early stage, later stage and growth capital investments. It seeks to invest in the digital media, marketing, software, mobile, technology, healthcare, and content distribution sectors. The firm was founded in 2011 and is based in New York with an additional office in Herzliya Pituach, Israel.

name: Mesa Ventures
description: Mesa Ventures is a venture capital firm. The firm seeks to invest in early stage internet and enterprise startups. The firm based in New York, New York with additional offices in San Francisco, California and Los Angeles, California and was established in 2012.

name: Milestone venture Partners
description: Milestone Venture Partners is an early stage venture capital firm which seeks to invest in the digital health, financial services and technology-enabled services companies based in Northeast and Mid-Atlantic. The firm was founded in 1999 and is based in New York, New York.

name: New Leaf Venture Partners
description: New Leaf Venture Partners is a healthcare technology focused venture capital firm based in New York, New York. It primarily caters to the bio-pharmaceuticals, information convergence, medical devices, and biological research tools and infrastructure sectors.

name: OrbiMed
description: OrbiMed is a venture capital and private equity firm which seeks to invest in the pharmaceuticals, life sciences, digital health, healthcare services, medical devices, biopharmaceuticals, diagnostics, healthcare technology and biotechnology sectors. The firm was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in New York, New York.

name: Pereg ventures
description: Pereg Ventures is an early-stage venture capital firm focused on identifying entrepreneurs with ambitious ideas that will transform the way the world markets. Pereg invests in businesses that solve real-world marketing and advertising problems, including market intelligence technologies, spend management tools, advertising solutions, and online and mobile enablers. They are currently investing in post-Seed through to Series B for portfolio companies based in the US or Israel.

name: RRE Ventures
description: RRE Ventures is an early and mid-stage venture capital firm based in New York City, New York. The firm invests primarily in Seed, Series A and Series B rounds and focuses on products or services enabled by information technology, which includes software and internet technology as well as hardware and technology-enabled services.

name: Scout ventures
description: Scout Ventures is a venture capital firm that seeks to invest in early stage companies that are disrupting established business models. Scout Ventures invests in the following sectors: Mobile and Digital Payments, Big Data analytics, commerce and services, cloud infrastructure, social content, ad tech, the shared economy, health and quantieifed self, and education technology. The firm is based in New York City and has a satellite office in Miami Florida.

name: Thrive Capital
description: Thrive Capital is a venture capital firm that makes seed, early, start up and late stage investments in internet and software sectors. The firm was founded in 2009 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Trlbeca Venture Partners
description: Tribeca Venture Partners is a venture capital firm which seeks to invest in the digital media, e-commerce, financial technology, education, ad-technology, mobile applications, software and information technology sectors. The firm was founded in 1998 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Union Square Ventures
description: Union Square Ventures is a venture capital firm based in New York, New York. The firm focuses on investing in companies operating in the financial services, internet, information technology, healthcare, retail, media and mobile sectors.
